alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 3:47PM CDT until August 03 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stapleton, Steelwood, Pine Haven and Bromley. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding especially around the Stapleton, Alabama area and along Interstate 10.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
